summary: This adds a simple treasure vault to lakeview manor that will grow in size.
descriptionHtml:
ALL CREDIT GOES TO AlCiao for providing the resource to make this mod (See his original mod here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9994//?]Als Treasure Vault by AlCiao[/url] )

This mod adds a treasure vault to the cliff side of the manor (refer to screenshots).

The treasure will grow in size depending on how much gold you put in it with statues, gems and the like by these margins:

10,000 gold
50,000 gold
100,000 gold
250,000 gold
500,000 gold
1,000,000 gold

Now you have a reason to collect all the gold! It will be shiny!

Goes great with my other mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41680/?]Immersive Gold Coin Weight[/url]
Now you have a reason to store your gold somewhere ;) And it might aswell be conveniently placed for people using the lakeview home.

CONFLICTS:
None yet.
Other lakeview manor mods might place something in the same place rendering them as a possible conflict.

REQUIREMENTS:
Skyrim.esm
HearthFires.esm

INSTALLATION:
With NMM:
1) Download with manager
2) Activate with manager
Done!

Manual:
1) Download the archive/.rar file manually.
2) Open said archive with winrar/7zip or likewise programs
3) Take the files in the folder and put it in your skyrim/data folder
4) Activate the plugin with your skyrim launcher or mod manager

MO/Wrye bash users:
I expect you know how to download mods and handle this mod on your own.

Have fun
Spphy

PERMISSIONS:
You need to ask me AND AlCiao for permission to use this mod for anything but personal use.

Credits:
AlCiao - for letting me use his resource.
CraftySentinel - For guiding me in the CK
author: Spphy
